title: A Nasus fix to end all Nasus updates.
body:
Honestly his biggest issue right now is that he is absolutely useless in teamfights.
Maybe if players blobbed up, and Nasus could somehow get them to split up...

**Q does AOE at 250 stacks**
25% damage at 250 stacks (for the aoe)
50% at 500.

**Moving his abilities around**
Wither - slow removed for grevious wounds + a free stack. 
Spirit Fire - is now a slow that builds up.

replies.body: How about, like, at 200 stacks, his Q becomes AoE, then at 400 he transforms from melee to ranged, then at 600 his Q deals true damage instead of physical?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sssQYhlM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-03-18T02:14:58.867+0000)
>
> How about, like, at 200 stacks, his Q becomes AoE, then at 400 he transforms from melee to ranged, then at 600 his Q deals true damage instead of physical?

The irony being this would actually make sense for Nasus more than it does for Kayle. He is after all a scholar, imagine him ascending to become a Wizard over the course of the game.
He is not meant to be good in teamfights. That is how you play against him, by forcing him to go into a 5v5
Guts his duel potential and anti carry too hard
Noooo, Nasus weakness is supposed to be his lack of AoE, sooooo no?

I’m pretty sure a 90% slow on an AOE ability is extremely op. And an AOE auto, with 50% dmg at 500? That’s 250 dmg+base to all enemy’s near, like, every two seconds. And grevious wounds is just unnecessary.

im down for it if they revert all his other buffs. I dont mind Nasus becoming a hyper carry if he can be shut down early to prevent it. This "im going to stack no matter what you do" gameplay is no fun
